content.rendered:
• Best for surgery requires magnification of 4x to 6x
  • The deep depth of focus reduces eye strain
  • Adjustable observation distance by rotating the lens barrel
  • Less aberration and clear image
BLP-4 BLP-6
Magnification 4.0x to 4.5x 5.5x to 6.0x
Working Distance (mm) 550 to 350 550 to 350
Field of View Diameter (mm) Ф80 to 50 Ф40 to 25

excerpt.rendered: BLP-4 BLP-6 Magnification 4.0x to 4.5x 5.5x to 6.0x Working Distance (mm) 550 to 350 550 to 350 Field of View Diameter (mm) Ф80 to 50 Ф40 to 25
